vlive.korean: 저 80살에 결혼하면 제 인생 책임져주실 거예요? If I get married at 80, will you take responsibility for me life? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: If I get married at 80, will you take responsibility for me life?

vlive.korean: [당연하지 80살이 뭐야] 제 인생 책임져주실 거예요? [Of course!] Will you be responsible for my life? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 어 그래 너.. 잘 살았다..! 이날 이때까지 울 망고했으니..! (REN playing with fans)
vlive.english: [Of course!] Will you be responsible for my life?

vlive.korean: 애들 성적 떨어지면 네가 책임질 거야? Are you going to take the responsibility when the classmates get bad grades? 듣기 View video tvN D : 디지털 드라마 <언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉> 메인 티저
vlive.english: Are you going to take the responsibility when the classmates get bad grades?

vlive.korean: 책임질게 - 예? We will. - What? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 술 마시고 남친이랑 대판 싸워버렸다 [인서울] - EP.13
책임질 수 있어요? You can take responsibility? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just one 10 minutes

examples.korean: the keeper of geology at the museum 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 박물관의 지질학 부문 책임자 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the keeper of geology at the museum Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was responsible for hiring and firing staff. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 직원 채용과 해고를 책임 맡고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was responsible for hiring and firing staff. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Someone must be held accountable for the killings. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 누군가가 이들 죽음에 대해 책임을 져야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Someone must be held accountable for the killings. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: All sales clerks answer to the store manager. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 판매원들은 매장 책임자에게 설명을 해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All sales clerks answer to the store manager. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ministers must be made answerable for their decisions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 장관들이 자신의 결정에 대해 책임을 지게 해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ministers must be made answerable for their decisions. Add to Wordbook
